conbody.p: The drop-down menu "Edit" contains the following entries:
This entry has currently no functionality.
This menu item is only available to users with administrator privileges.
If you click on the "Edit current Project", a window comes up, where you can edit the current project's name and description.
This option allows you to set User Status for the currently selected database object (corpus, text, lemma, thesaurus entry etc.).

If two users work simultaneously on one database object, it is possible, that they produce different versions at the same time. This is indicated by the icon in the Navigator tree. The conflict dialog solves the problem, which version is the preferable one.
The Revision History enables the user to compare the changes made to an database object and to return to a certain version of the text.
